INTRO_TITLE: Explore my portfolio in every pixel
pc:
Here I work every day with React, Typescript and Next.js. Also most of the time I try different things like Tailwind o Kaboom.js

I am also taking the CS50's Introduction to Computer Science course from Harvard University, you can see it here, it is free but very theoretical!
resume:
Chaa chaaan!!! Here is my CV, you can download here

I put there all the experience and knowledge as Frontened Developer.
tv:
Why are frontend developers great at social media? Because they're always on top of the latest trends.... and they always do a 'refresh' on their sense of humor to stay up to date

Here are my social networks, so that you can stalk me

Contact me at 05rosa04@gmail.com if you have any interesting job opportunities!
cs-degree: This is my CS title. I hung it on the wall because I am proud of it. Now, I am a systems engineer. Although it was a very theoretical degree, but I think it gave me a good foundation.
sofa-table: In this comfortable armchair I plan my next trips all over the world, the last one was to Italy. I also read romance novels and programming books like Clean Code by Robert C. Martin.
kitchen: In this place, eating bread and drinking coffee, I have had the best ideas because I can relax and think about the solution to the problem I have in front of me or just get good ideas of projects that I would like to do.
library:
This is my favorite place in the whole world, in these bookstores I have books of all kinds (adventure, romance, dystopia, Fantasy, etc...) but most of the books are about programming, I have books of C, C++, Python, Javascript, Typpescript, about basics and good practices; I also have Spanish and English books.

...Who else compulsively buys books without ever finishing them?
